message.name: ERR_SAMPLESPORTINGACTIVITYEXPENSE_XRV_TOTALAMOUNT_SPORTINGACTIVITYPAYMENTAMOUNT
message.locale: The total Amount of all Sample Sporting Activity Expenses must be less than or equal to the Sample Sporting Activity Payment Amount.

message.name: ERR_SAMPLESPORTINGACTIVITYEXPENSE_XRV_SPORTINGACTIVITY_MISSING
message.locale: This Sporting Activity Expense record must have a related Sporting Activity record.

message.name: ERR_SAMPLESPORTINGACTIVITYEXPENSE_XRV_SPORTINGACTIVITY_EXISTS
message.locale: One or more overlapping Sporting Activity Expense records of type %1s have been found for %2s.
